Amazon River | Facts, History, Location, Length, Animals, & Map | Britannica
s: July 24, 1998 - The Amazon River is located in the northern portion of South America, flowing from west to east. The river system originates in the Andes Mountains of Peru and travels through Ecuador, Colombia, Venezuela, Bolivia, and Brazil before emptying into the Atlantic Ocean.
